intro: When the timer is running one LED keeps blibking

build.steps: Connect the temperature sensor, two 220 ohm resistots and 2 LEDs on the breadboard

steps: 1. Connect a jumper wire between positive pin of LED1 and Resistor 1 (R1)
2. Connect a jumper wire between positive pin of LED2 and Resistor 2 (R2)
3. Connect a jumper wire from D2 to one side of (R2)
4. Connect a jumper wire from D2 to one side of (R2)
1. Connect a jumper wire from GND to negative rail of the breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the negative pin of LED1
3. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to the negative pin of LED2
1. Connect a jumper wire from 5V to positive rail of the breadboard
2. Connect a jumper wire from positive rail to the positive pin of temperature sensor
3. Connect a jumper wire from A1 to middle pin of the temperature sensor
4. Connect a jumper wire from negative rail to negative pin of the temperature sensor
5. Run the project and go to the Play Section
